Rulings.Base: 1. You can equip this card to monsters like "Cyber Harpie Lady" that are considered to be "Harpie Lady".\n2. Even though there are 3 Harpie Lady Sisters, "Harpie Lady Sisters" is 1 monster and gains only 500 ATK from "Cyber Shield".
